Specimen Container(s): BD BACTEC™ blood culture bottles (Plus Aerobic/F, Plus Anaerobic/F, Standard/10 Aerobic/F, Standard Anaerobic/F)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for KeyPath™ MRSA/MSSA Blood Culture Test-BT for rapid identification and resistance determination of S. aureus directly from positive blood cultures using bacteriophage amplification.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic test for identification of Staphylococcus aureus and determination of methicillin susceptibility (MSSA) or resistance (MRSA) directly from positive blood cultures, performed in conjunction with other laboratory and clinical data.
